QuestData.Title: Swamplighter Queen
QuestData.Description: It looks like those plant creatures used some kind of poison when they attacked Gidwin.$b$bIt's a powerful concoction to say the least.$b$bIf we are going to cure Gidwin we need one more special ingredient. This one might be a bit harder to obtain than the others.$b$bYou up to the challenge, $n?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain The Swamplighter Queen's Tail for Fiona in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.CompletionText: I just wanted to pick some herbs and relax with my boys... I should have stayed in Azeroth.
QuestData.RewardText: Wow, that was fast! Ok, let's get to it!
